title: eJay House v1.01.0010-CHAOS [deepstatus]
description:
eJay House v1.01.0010









Feel like going clubbing? Why not start off at home, by creating your own tunes whilst getting ready for a big night out? With House eJay, you can create a genuine House music sound from the comfort of your home. The successful drag & drop principle features in House eJay, and leaves you with the easy task: simply drag your favourite sound blocks onto the tracks in the arranger and create your very own house track.

In the FX Studio with built-in Vocoder you can modify your samples and create new ones using the wide range of editing tools. Make your own pumping drum loops in the Groove Generator and then get the overall sound of your track just right by using the booster and audio mixer. And whilst you are at it, you can put visuals to your song with the Music Animator.

Forget bricks and mortar- just take House eJay, the latest software title in the eJay range, and make your own house music. House eJay comes complete with 3,000 house and garage samples including 50 exclusive samples from big-name UK house DJs Phats & Small. Just drag your choice of these sound blocks onto the audio tracks in the Arranger and youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll have a house hit in a matter of minutes.


Simply drag your favourite sound blocks onto the tracks in the arranger and create your very own house track.

More than 3,000 royalty-free sounds

50 exclusive samples from top DJs Phats & Small

24-track sound mixer

FX Studio with integrated Vocoder

Grooves Generator

Music Animator to put visuals to your tunes


_________________________________________________________________________________________________



   System Requirements

Windows 7/Vista/XP, DirectX 8.1, 1,5 GHz processor, 512 MB Memory, 680 MB Hard Disk Space





[Installation]

UnRar.

Install ejay_house_setup.
( choose proper lang in setup window )

Don't launch yet.

Copy the content from Patch folder to installation directory

x64: C:Program Files (x86)eJayHouse
x86: C:Program Files (x86)eJayHouse
